name: @stadionhq/dynamic-yield-js
author: StadionHQ
description: Dynamic Yield API client for JavaScript

scripts.test: echo 'The tests are not implemented yet'
scripts.test:watch: echo 'The tests are not implemented yet'
scripts.generate-api:dy-dev-serve: npx api install @dy-dev/v2.3.0#gqe12mawego61 --identifier dy-dev-serve --lang ts --yes && yarn remove @api/dy-dev-serve && cp .api/apis/dy-dev-serve/openapi.json src/openapi/openapi-dev-serve.json && rm -rf .api
scripts.generate-api:dy-dev: npx api install @dy-dev/v2.3.0#gqeomawegkw6 --identifier dy-dev --lang ts --yes && yarn remove @api/dy-dev && cp .api/apis/dy-dev/openapi.json src/openapi/openapi-dev.json && rm -rf .api
scripts.generate-api: npm run generate-api:dy-dev-serve && npm run generate-api:dy-dev && npx openapi-typescript ./src/openapi/openapi-dev.json -o ./src/openapi/openapi-dev.ts && npx openapi-typescript ./src/openapi/openapi-dev-serve.json -o ./src/openapi/openapi-dev-serve.ts
